subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Fernando Alonso has reportedly been asked to return to Renault, his Formula One team when he won the 2005 and 2006 world championships. Alonso quit McLaren on Friday after clashing with Ron Dennis, the part owner of the British team, and his teammate Lewis Hamilton. Alonso finished third in the points race behind the champion Kimi Raikkonen of Ferrari and Hamilton. “I have presented a project for the future to Fernando,” Flavio Briatore of Renault was quoted as saying yesterday on the Web site of Gazzetta dello Sport.
